112.content:
When you woke up this morning, you felt something... off. Almost as if you were in a different place, but everything looked the same. You sit on your bed for a little while, thinking about how bizarre that feeling was, but everything looks the same, so it has to be the same, right? Your thoughts are interrupted when you hear your older brother calling you, probably from his room. You decide to drop your little feeling and answer Jeremy's call. Once you are in his room, you open the door. "What?" You ask. You see Jeremy wearing his red wrestling singlet, which is not a surprise since he is pretty much always wrestling, he loves to wrestle against you, probably because he always wins. "Can I ask you a favor?" Jeremy doesn't even wait for your reply and starts explaining. "I have a wrestling match tomorrow and I want to practice some of my moves with you." Jeremy grins at you, you know refusing would only lead to him wrestling you down anyway, so there's no point in saying no, instead, you try to negotiate your way out. "Why don't you wrestle with Julien?" While Julien may not be as muscular as Jeremy, he's pretty much a better training buddy than you would be. "He's in a football game or something. C'on! It'll be fun!" 'Fun' is one way to put it. Knowing your options are either make Jeremy happy and practice with him or make Jeremy angry and face his rage, you decide to reluctantly agree. "*sigh* Fine, OK". Jeremy smiles, and makes some room in his room to start the match, he moves some furniture and you are ready to go.

The match starts, and soon you realize Jeremy hasn't showered since his last wrestling match, he's all sweaty even when the match barely started and knowing he can overpower you easily, there's no way he could have sweat that much in a few seconds. Soon, your brother pins you in a weird position. He is laying on top of your body with his armpit right on your face while using his arms to pin yours on the ground, you start to think this was not an incidental position, but you decide to let it go. "Ok, you won, can I go now?" You ask, trying not to let your brother's sweat and stinky armpit's stench in your nose. "I'm not even started yet... I still have to practice some of my special 'moves'" You are able to see an evil grin in your brother's mouth, you have no idea what he has in store but there's no way to get away from him.
